name: rowan festive knit along
sizes_available: cushion - 17.75" (45 cm) square. throw - 31.5" (80 cm) wide x 43.75" (110 cm) long
notes:
this kal is free to everyone.  the pattern, with weekly installments, as listed below, is available by signing up on rowan connect. https://www.rowanconnect.net/offers/f5lku9aj/checkout

this is the only way to receive the pattern.  you need to register, but it is free.   a link will be sent out to all who have registered on monday, september 15th. you can click on the link to download the pattern. 

for more information about the kal, please visit - https://www.rowanconnect.net/offers/f5lku9aj/checkout

the rowan connect kal facebook group link is https://www.facebook.com/groups/620741256591207  this is a great group to answer questions that you may have about the kal as it progresses.   

you will need a cushion insert approximately 16" (42 cm) to fit.   if you wish to add a zipper, there will be a zipper tutorial given during the finishing weeks of the kal.
